resources.string: Your zodiac sign provides insight into some specific traits, desires, and attitudes you have toward life.
The are 3 elements that each sign belongs to: air, fire, and water.
Astrology is the study of the movements and relative positions of celestial bodies interpreted as having an influence on human affairs and the natural world.
Each sign begins on the 1st day of the month and ends on the last.
The first sign of the zodiac calendar is _____, meaning ram in Latin.
Your zodiac is great for a little self insight!
There are 4 elements that correspond with 3 signs each: Fire, Earth, Air, Water.
Each person\'s chart is compiled from the place and time of birth around the world, making you completely unique!
The signs start between the 19th and 23rd, and they run approx. a month.
The last sign of the Zodiac is Pieces.
Find out more and get a free birth chart at https://cafeastrology.com/
The emblem of this sign is a ram, and this sign starts off the Spring.
